name: M.A.S.H [A26]
description:
You are the new pilot of the Missing Animal Search Hovercraft, better known as M.A.S.H.! You've been sent out to rescue the animals lost in the fields. Rescue as many as you can and take them back to the farmhouse!

This is a recreation of the Atari 2600 game, M*A*S*H* (1986).

Controls WASD / Arrow keys
Moves M.A.S.H.
RResets level (will also reset score of currently rescued animals - so beware!)
Credits
  • Music - "Cookie Island" & "Bomberguy" from PlayOnLoop.com

  • SFX from freesound.org
  • Visual assets (e.g. alien, animals, background elements) from Kenney.nl
